dcmuiAetListName.title: List Name
dcmuiAetListName.description: Define a name for this config

dcmuiMode.title: AEt list mode
dcmuiMode.description: Define in which mode should be this config available in 'internal' ( archive own AETs, in some places called also 'Home AET' or 'Local AET' ) or 'external' ( or in some places also called 'Remote AET' ) aet drop-down list, to be available for both don't select any of them

dcmAcceptedUserRole.title: Accepted User Role
dcmAcceptedUserRole.description: Define the roles for which this config should be available, use 'user' to be available for all roles
